name: COMMUNITY SERVICE SOCIETY OF NEW YORK
description: Non-profit that provides social services & support to middle- and low-income New Yorkers.
sampleDescriptions: To restore funding for the ACA Consumer Assistance Program and to create a dedicated federal funding stream to assist community-based organizations and others that provide consumer assistance counseli

To restore funding for the ACA Consumer Assistance Program and to create a dedicated federal funding stream to assist community-based organizations and others that provide consumer assistance counseli
Issues related to restoring funding for the ACA Consumer Assistance Program.
Issues related to creating a dedicated federal funding stream that provides consumer assistance counseling and services to student loan borrowers.
Raising awareness for the need to revise the federal poverty measure to reflect cost of living changes.
